name: Crypt o' Casino
description:
WARNING: PLEASE REFRESH PAGE IF YOU GAME OVER, LAST MINUTE BUG WASN'T KIND TO ME AND I NEED SLEEP!

-CONTROLS-

Keyboard
WASD/Arrow Keys: Move
X/L/SPACE: Jump
Z/K: Attack

Gamepad
A: Jump 
X: Attack

Find your way through the casino gauntlet and bring the never-ending gambling nightmare to a halt forever!! ...Or until you become addicted once again.

Music by Joel C (@lenkalamari)
